name: Jordanell Resevoir
description: A spectacular view of the mountains and Jordanell Reservoir. Pitched my tent in a more barren spot than yesterday.  This was a day use only area primarily as access to the reservoir for fishing at the reservoir.

location.description: 2830 E State Highway 35, Kamas, UT 84036, USA

comments: No overnight camping allowed, but no one kicked me out.  Got the tent up at sunset and down soon after sunrise.  I had the place mostly to myself.
